## Queue3.getJobs() method

Returns a promise that will return an array of job instances of the given types. Optional parameters for range and ordering are provided.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getJobs(types: JobType[] | JobType, start?: number, end?: number, asc?: boolean): Promise<Array<Job>>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  start | number |  |
|  end | number |  |
|  asc | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Array&lt;[Job](./bullmq.job.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;
